00012 #ifndef ASCII_IF_H_
00013 #define ASCII_IF_H_
00014 
00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * ASCII datafile output interface class implementation. Creates a datafile  *
00017  * where each row represents an event.                                       *
00018  *                                                                           *
00019  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00020 
00021 #include <fstream>
00022 #include <Camgen/if_output.h>
00023 
00024 namespace Camorra
00025 {
00027     
00028     template<class model_t>class ascii_file: public interface_output<model_t>
00029     {
00030         typedef interface_output<model_t> base_type;
00031 
00032         public:
00033 
00034             /* Type definitions: */
00035 
00036             typedef model_t model_type;
00037             typedef typename model_type::value_type value_type;
00038             typedef vector<value_type,model_t::dimension> momentum_type;
00039             typedef typename std::vector<value_type>::iterator weight_iterator;
00040             typedef typename std::vector<value_type>::const_iterator const_weight_iterator;
00041             
00042             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const momentum_type*>::iterator vector_iterator;
00043             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const value_type*>::iterator value_iterator;
00044             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const int*>::iterator integer_iterator;
00045             typedef typename std::map<std::string,const bool*>::iterator boolean_iterator;
00046 
00047             /* Constructor with file name argument */
00048 
00049             ascii_file(const std::string& file_name_):base_type(file_name_),line(0){}
00050 
00051             /* Constructor with file name, tree name and tree description arguments: */
00052 
00053             ascii_file(const std::string& file_name_,const std::string description_):base_type(file_name_,description_),line(0){}
00054 
00055             /* Destructor: */
00056 
00057             ~ascii_file(){}
00058 
00059             /* Creation method implementation: */
00060 
00061             interface_output<model_t>* create(const std::string& file_name_) const
00062             {
00063                 return new ascii_file<model_t>(file_name_,this->description);
00064             }
00065 
00066             /* Opens the (temporary) datafile. */
00067 
00068             bool open_file()
00069             {
00070                 std::string fname=this->file_name+".dat";
00071                 ofs.open(fname.c_str());
00072                 if(ofs.is_open())
00073                 {
00074                     return true;
00075                 }
00076                 return false;
00077             }
00078 
00079             /* Closes the datafile. */
00080 
00081             bool close_file()
00082             {
00083                 if(ofs.is_open())
00084                 {
00085                     ofs.close();
00086                 }
00087                 return !(ofs.is_open());
00088             }
00089 
00090             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding a Lorentz vector: */
00091 
00092             bool branch(const momentum_type* p,const std::string& varname)
00093             {
00094                 if(line!=0)
00095                 {
00096                     return false;
00097                 }
00098                 vectors[varname]=p;
00099                 values.erase(varname);
00100                 integers.erase(varname);
00101                 booleans.erase(varname);
00102                 return true;
00103             }
00104 
00105             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding a floating-point number:
00106              * */
00107 
00108             bool branch(const value_type* x,const std::string& varname)
00109             {
00110                 if(line!=0)
00111                 {
00112                     return false;
00113                 }
00114                 vectors.erase(varname);
00115                 values[varname]=x;
00116                 integers.erase(varname);
00117                 booleans.erase(varname);
00118                 return true;
00119             }
00120 
00121             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding an integer. */
00122 
00123             bool branch(const int* n,const std::string& varname)
00124             {
00125                 if(line!=0)
00126                 {
00127                     return false;
00128                 }
00129                 vectors.erase(varname);
00130                 values.erase(varname);
00131                 integers[varname]=n;
00132                 booleans.erase(varname);
00133                 return true;
00134             }
00135 
00136             /* Virtual method adding a branch holding a boolean. */
00137 
00138             bool branch(const bool* b,const std::string& varname)
00139             {
00140                 if(line!=0)
00141                 {
00142                     return false;
00143                 }
00144                 vectors.erase(varname);
00145                 values.erase(varname);
00146                 integers.erase(varname);
00147                 booleans[varname]=b;
00148                 return true;
00149             }
00150 
00151             /* Writes the event to the output file. */
00152 
00153             bool write_event()
00154             {
00155                 if(!ofs.is_open())
00156                 {
00157                     return false;
00158                 }
00159                 if(line==0)
00160                 {
00161                     ofs<<'#';
00162                     for(vector_iterator it=vectors.begin();it!=vectors.end();++it)
00163                     {
00164                         for(typename momentum_type::size_type i=0;i<model_type::dimension;++i)
00165                         {
00166                             std::stringstream ss;
00167                             ss<<it->first<<'['<<i<<']';
00168                             ofs<<std::setw(20)<<ss.str();
00169                         }
00170                     }
00171                     for(value_iterator it=values.begin();it!=values.end();++it)
00172                     {
00173                         ofs<<std::setw(20)<<it->first;
00174                     }
00175                     for(integer_iterator it=integers.begin();it!=integers.end();++it)
00176                     {
00177                         ofs<<std::setw(10)<<it->first;
00178                     }
00179                     for(boolean_iterator it=booleans.begin();it!=booleans.end();++it)
00180                     {
00181                         ofs<<std::setw(10)<<it->first;
00182                     }
00183                     ofs<<std::endl;
00184                     line=1;
00185                 }
00186                 for(vector_iterator it=vectors.begin();it!=vectors.end();++it)
00187                 {
00188                     for(typename momentum_type::size_type i=0;i<model_type::dimension;++i)
00189                     {
00190                         ofs<<std::setw(20)<<(*(it->second))[i];
00191                     }
00192                 }
00193                 for(value_iterator it=values.begin();it!=values.end();++it)
00194                 {
00195                     ofs<<std::setw(20)<<*(it->second);
00196                 }
00197                 for(integer_iterator it=integers.begin();it!=integers.end();++it)
00198                 {
00199                     ofs<<std::setw(10)<<*(it->second);
00200                 }
00201                 for(boolean_iterator it=booleans.begin();it!=booleans.end();++it)
00202                 {
00203                     ofs<<std::setw(10)<<*(it->second);
00204                 }
00205                 ofs<<std::endl;
00206                 ++line;
00207                 return true;
00208             }
00209 
00210         private:
00211 
00212             std::ofstream ofs;
00213 
00214             int line;
00215 
00216             std::map<std::string,const momentum_type*> vectors;
00217             std::map<std::string,const value_type*> values;
00218             std::map<std::string,const int*> integers;
00219             std::map<std::string,const bool*> booleans;
00220     };
00221 }
00222 
00223 #endif /*ASCII_IF_H_*/
